actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 110 of title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the standard for preservation of disability evaluations for compensation purposes.

summary.text: Repeals the provision requiring the preservation of total disability ratings for compensation purposes. Reduces from 20 to five years the period after which a rating cannot be reduced for pension and insurance purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 110 of title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the standard for preservation of disability evaluations for compensation purposes.
